scripts.host-daemon:capture-preview: pnpm host-daemon:build && node host-daemon/dist/index.js --mode capture-preview --fps 30 --duration-sec 300 --pixel-format nv12
scripts.host-daemon:capture-preview:quick: pnpm host-daemon:build && node host-daemon/dist/index.js --mode capture-preview --fps 30 --duration-sec 20 --pixel-format nv12
scripts.host-daemon:h264-selftest: pnpm host-daemon:build && node host-daemon/dist/index.js --mode h264-selftest --width 1280 --height 720 --fps 30 --duration-sec 15 --bitrate-kbps 6000 --profile baseline --pixel-format nv12
scripts.host-daemon:h264-selftest:quick: pnpm host-daemon:build && node host-daemon/dist/index.js --mode h264-selftest --width 640 --height 360 --fps 30 --duration-sec 5 --bitrate-kbps 2500 --profile baseline --pixel-format nv12
scripts.host-daemon:udp-lan:host: pnpm host-daemon:build && node host-daemon/dist/index.js --mode udp-lan-host --target-host 127.0.0.1 --target-port 5004 --width 1280 --height 720 --fps 30 --duration-sec 600 --bitrate-kbps 6000 --profile baseline --pixel-format nv12
scripts.host-daemon:udp-lan:host:quick: pnpm host-daemon:build && node host-daemon/dist/index.js --mode udp-lan-host --target-host 127.0.0.1 --target-port 5004 --width 640 --height 360 --fps 30 --duration-sec 20 --bitrate-kbps 2500 --profile baseline --pixel-format nv12
scripts.host-daemon:udp-lan:client: pnpm host-daemon:build && node host-daemon/dist/index.js --mode udp-lan-client --listen-host 0.0.0.0 --listen-port 5004 --decoder ffplay --duration-sec 600
scripts.host-daemon:udp-lan:client:quick: pnpm host-daemon:build && node host-daemon/dist/index.js --mode udp-lan-client --listen-host 0.0.0.0 --listen-port 5004 --decoder ffplay --duration-sec 25
scripts.host-daemon:relay:host: pnpm host-daemon:build && node host-daemon/dist/index.js --mode relay-host --relay-url ws://localhost:3333/stream/relay --session-id SESSION_ID --user-id USER_ID --stream-id STREAM_ID --auth-token STREAM_TOKEN --width 1280 --height 720 --fps 30 --duration-sec 600 --bitrate-kbps 6000 --profile baseline --pixel-format nv12
